MAN.TITLE: buttondialog

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string, icon type, should be: error, hourglass, info, passwd, question and warning.

DESCRIPTION.P: buttondialog create a simple button dialog and retur the answer. buttons identify the buttons to show in the following manner : "button_1|button_2....|button_n"

MAN.EXAMPLE: answ=buttondialog("This is an example","ok"); answ=buttondialog("Do the work?","yes|no|maybe","question");
